Sentencas: Infiltration through spray-pyrolysis deposition is a one-step and effective method for enhancing the electrode performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Among various infiltrated electrodes, Pr6O11 has shown promising electrocatalytic properties for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR), despite its relatively low electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: This study focuses on obtaining Pr6O11-infiltrated cathodes using spraypyrolysis deposition, with different porous backbone layers that exhibit electronic and/or ionic conductivity: La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM), Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (CGO), and LSM-CGO composite.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties and the subprocesses involved in the ORR are investigated in symmetrical cells.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: It is observed that the polarization resistance (Rp) decreases when the backbone layer exhibits high ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: At 650 degrees C, the Rp values are 0.03, 0.06 and 0.1 O cm2 for CGO, LSM-CGO and LSM backbones, respectively.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The dependence of Rp contributions with pO2 reveals that the same electrochemical processes are involved regardless of the backbone composition, confirming a less resistive oxide-ion transport from the TPB into the electrolyte with the CGO backbone.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: In contrast, the CGO backbone exhibits higher series resistance (Rs) (44.5 O cm), attributed to an increased contribution of ohmic losses compared to the LSM backbone (39.8 O cm).
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: This study provides valuable insights into the performance and optimization of Pr6O11-infiltrated cathodes with different backbone compositions for their implementation in SOFCs.
Titulo: Electrochemical investigation of Pr6O11infiltration into La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 cathodes for IT-SOFC
